text:
Saroj Khan (born Nirmala Nagpal; 22 November 1948 – 3 July 2020) was an Indian dance choreographer in Hindi cinema. She was born at the Bombay State (present day Maharashtra), India. She was known as "The Mother of Dance/Choreography in India". Her best known works was choreographing for "Mr. India", "Nagina" and "Chandni".
Khan died on 3 July 2020 from cardiac arrest at a Mumbai hospital, aged 71.
